titles.title: Little By Little He's Changing Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Little by little He's changing me.
Line upon line He is changing me.
Precept on precept until I'm free,
Jesus is changing me.
Day by day He is changing me.
In every way He is changing me.
When I am yielded He sets me free.
Jesus is changing me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Poco a poco, me cambia mí
Línea tras línea me cambia a mí
Precepto a precepto hasta ser feliz
Cristo me cambia a mí
